title: Pixel 4 XL has portrait mode camera bug
content:
Pixel 4 XL has portrait mode camera bug, while stitching the picture, there is a clear gap between foreground and background. 

This is the worst kind of experience from a new pixel phone.

I have noticed this phone after taking bunch of pictures during my weekend trip and printed one of the portrait pictures on a canvas. It looks disgusting and pixelated(Now i know why series is named Pixel ;p)
